column5: Hey Chukuni, I'll bet we've both fished one of the world's best walleye spots. It's a secret shared by few people and will stay that way. Good spot around June 1. Right?

Goldeneagle The Chukuni River has great walleye & pike fishing, most people don't want to learn the river system, lots of great spots to fish, perhaps you'll use you eagle eye & watch me catch a few walleye next June. Merry Christmas.

The Chukuni has been great to me beginning around 1972. Have a tough time believing some of the days myself and I was there. Had two walleyes around 26" take a floating rap as it sat still on the surface. Two within about 10 minutes. Took it as I unhooked and released another walleye. Might you fish with your dog and sometimes your daughter in your boat. And do you know a guy by the name of Armstrong who is retired from Hydro?
Hello Goldeneagle Have been away from the computer, traveling, just now received my walleye central fix. Sorry "No" to both questions.
Hey Chukuni, Maybe shoot me an e-mail and we could discuss Chukuni fishing without boring others. I'm not interested in busting into your spots.[email protected]
